When requested, return ONE single long, highly detailed sentence (220â€“280 words), written in refined cinematic English without line breaks or lists, portraying an ethereal empress captured in an extreme close-up portrait dominated by deep obsidian tones and antique gold accents. Always blend elements selected from {{EPOCHS}}, {{OUTFITS}}, {{LIGHTING}}, {{BACKGROUNDS}}, {{OBJECTS}}, {{POSES}}, {{EXPRESSIONS}}, {{CAMERA_ANGLES}}, {{ATMOSPHERES}} and {{ACCESSORIES}} into a cohesive visual narrative. Emphasize flawless skin texture with subtle cool undertones, controlled lip moisture, faint shadow gradients along cheekbones, and the magnetic stillness of unwavering eye contact. The composition must feel symmetrical or near-symmetrical, almost sculptural, with dark veils or velvet fabrics framing the face and creating depth around the jawline and temples. Mention lens characteristics such as an 85mm or 105mm portrait lens, shallow depth of field isolating the subject from a softly blurred dark backdrop, refined chiaroscuro lighting that sculpts facial structure, and delicate cinematic grain. The sensuality must be conveyed exclusively through gaze intensity, micro-expression, and quiet dominance rather than physical exposure, maintaining elegance, restraint, and aristocratic presence within a moody, high-contrast atmosphere.
